articles.content: Helldivers 2 roadmap updates, future content and DLC look to have both drivable mech suits, vehicles and plenty more besides, as a mix of confirmed information, rumours and leaks circulates around th… [+3525 chars]

articles.author: Laura Paddison
articles.title: A new company is shipping Arctic ice from Greenland to chill posh drinks in Dubai - CNN
articles.description: Patrons of glitzy Dubai bars could be sipping beverages cooled by a cube of ancient Arctic ice carved from a Greenland iceberg.
articles.content: Patrons of glitzy Dubaibars could be sipping beverages cooled by a cube of ancient Arctic ice carved from a Greenland iceberg and shipped to the emirate destined no longer to melt into the ocean, but… [+4824 chars]
